overview: The doctor is in. Krystal Steal stars as Dr. Teena in this mind-warping, sex-filled thriller. Under her white lab coat, she's more twisted than any of her patients. To a lonely, desperate housewife, she recommends a wham-bam-thank-you-ma' am d.p. from two well-hung black studs. To a pretty girl who seaks counseling for everything in her life, she turns her therapy into a sexual mind game with none other than herself. Before she slams a poor overworked wimp into reality with a brutal mind-fuck. Krystal Steal delivers sexual healing to the hilt in this action-packed film. So head for the couch and get ready for a Freudian slip you won't soon forget.
title: Krystal Therapy
